评论详情: We ordered this for her to wear for a funeral but she loves it so much that she wears it for lots of other events. It’s classy and beautiful. Great quality and comfortable for her to wear long hours.

评论概述: Looks full, is thin and flat
评论详情: The picture present a dress with a very full skirt that looks like high quality fabric. In reality it hung on my daughter like thin cheap fabric with no shape at all to the skirt. Very misleading, that is why now I think this is a computer generated photo and not showing the actual dress.

Bought this dress in two sizes (S and XS) to determine which one fit better.  The fabrics between the two were entirely different, with one showing that it was 95% rayon and the other showing it was 95% cotton.  Other than the fact that there seems to be consistency issues, the dresses were cute and fit well.  But, make sure you get what you ordered.

When I order this dress for myself in XXL it's a real thick polycotton and I love it. I just ordered this dress for my daughter in a medium and it's a completely different material  lighter like flowy spandex.  I wish there was consistency in the fabric. Rather than change it due to size.

I recently had the pleasure of seeing my daughter wear the GOOBGS Women’s 1950s Retro Vintage Spaghetti Strap Cocktail Swing Dress for her graduation, and I must say, it was quite a hit! Right from the beginning, the dress exuded a charming vintage appeal, reminiscent of classic summer gatherings and elegant soirées. The spaghetti straps added a touch of femininity, while the swing design allowed for graceful movement. She felt comfortable and free, which is essential for any grad celebrating such an important milestone. One of the standout features of this dress is, of course, the pockets! They were a delightful surprise, perfect for storing small essentials, like her phone and lipstick, without taking away from the dress’s elegant silhouette. The fabric quality impressed us, as it was soft yet structured, allowing the dress to maintain its shape throughout the day. In terms of fit, it was true to size and flattered her figure beautifully. The vintage-inspired patterns offered a variety of options, making it easy for her to choose a dress that matched her personality perfectly. Overall, the GOOBGS cocktail dress not only made my daughter look stunning, but it also provided the comfort and practicality needed for graduation festivities. If you’re looking for a stylish and functional option for a special occasion, this dress deserves a spot on your list!
Love this dress! Cute, stylish, great color. Nice quality for the price.
Perfect
Came as shown, but the material is extremely cheap feeling and if any heat gets near it will make burn marks on the dress so do not try to iron it.

I am disappointed with this item, do not recommend it if you are looking for a swing dress and will not purchase again.

I purchase this dress for my daughter to wear at Homecoming. I loved the color, so she too. She  loved the way it fit her. She’s 5.8 1/2 height so we went with a 3x height on make sure the length was good. And it is perfect. The straps adjust and the back of the dress is stretchy a bit. This dress is perfect to wear converse like she did or even dressy shoes. She wore converse for comfort. The only thing that was a little tricky is to iron it. It took a little longer to do. So maybe taking it to the cleaners or using a hand held steamy machine might make it go quicker.
Fits shape beautifully

I have bought a few dresses from this company. The Dino is perfect. The solid orange is perfect.  It this is the second one in a checkered pattern and it’s the second one that is too small. They have a stretch panel in the other designs and this one doesn’t have it. I wear a 2 x and it doesn’t fit my chest. Other designs are great.

Got this for Homecoming for my daughter! The fit was great and the pockets were perfect for lipgloss and her ID. We did have to pin the straps a little so her bra didn't show but she loved it.
Bought this for my daughter for her homecoming dance. Beautiful dress, very lightweight material, and it has pockets! Size runs as specified.

I got this for my daughter for homecoming at school. It's nice because it's something that can be worn for informal but nice gatherings. I got a size small for my daughter because she is petite and it fits her just right. The pockets are deep but not too deep and not obviously noticeable. The one thing i really noticed was the fabric. It's nicely made but the fabric is thin. Overall, my daughter likes it and so do i. It makes a great party dress for the summer time.

I bought this to wear at a car show, I ran a booth for my company and despite the mixed reviews I was quite pleased. Soft, silky material. Adjustable straps. POCKETS! The fitting in the front was just right, there were no uneven lines/seams like other reviews mentioned. Flattering and perfect for my shape I got so many compliments. I bought this in black a size small. I am 5’2 and 130lbs.

The dress arrived rumpled, horribly wrinkled, with no tag, the zipper all the way undone, and smelling of perfume. It's very obviously been worn. What a disappointment. I'm returning for a full refund.

I bought this dress form my Miss Argentina from Beetlejuice costume. The dress is 95% Cotton 5% Spandex. The Spandex is in the ruching around the mid section and it has a zipper up the back. This was a pleasant surprise as I wasn't sure what the fabric was and I'm glad it's not Polyester. As cotton does it wrinkles but nothing a little steaming can't fix. This dress is gorgeous and the shape is very flattering for plus size, not see through at all. A very versatile dress, so I will be wearing it for more than just my costume. I might just get it in another color too! I'm typically a size 18 USA and I bought the 3xl. It fits perfect!

This dress was a medium... fits her perfectly...

评论概述: Will work great for Highland Games!
评论详情: I was beginning to give up hope in finding a dress for the upcoming Highland Games that my family is attending. I’m so glad I tried one more! I’m usually size XL, but ordered an XXL to be on the safe side and I’m glad I did. The smocking on the back really helps it fit a variety of bust sizes. The length is great! It goes down to my knees, so I can wear bike shorts with it. I’m 5’3 for reference. I slipped it on overhead before realizing there’s a side zipper, which is just an added bonus for easy on and off. My notes: I wish the straps were adjustable. The bodice is a nice, modest fit so I don’t feel like I’m at any risk of spillage, but it would have been a nice tough. The fabric is not the best quality, but I didn’t expect it to be. It wrinkles easily and will definitely need ironed or steamed before first wear. The pockets bulge out a bit due to my large hip region, and I saw some other reviewers mention the same issue. Since this is for an event, though, it will work and I’m also just grateful for pockets in general.

My daughter wore this for her 8th grade dance. She’s a very self conscious girl and she absolutely loved this dress. Very flattering and comfortable. The material was a little weird, but it didn’t seam to bother her. Bought last minute, worked perfect for her event. Very versatile can dress it up or wear it more casual. Can’t beat the price.
Very good quality. Fit perfectly and super cute. Feel good dress!
Hot this dress for my daughter to wear under her gown for graduation. She loved the look, feel and how comfortable it was.
Some of the worst material I’ve seen in a very long time. Cheap and thin, a potatoe sack would be comparable to this material

I get so many compliments when I wear this dress. I absolutely love the fit! It’s super flattering on curvy women. The stitching is strong and I don’t think it will rip very easily. The length is perfect for work. The fabric is very breathable but does wrinkle easily. I find it best to hang dry rather than put in the dryer. Super cute dress! I have multiple different patterns of fabric. Love it!

评论概述: Super cute dress and it has pockets!
评论详情: I love this dress! If you're looking for a simple little black dress that you can dress up or dress down this is it! Finding that it had pockets was a great surprise! If I wear it with flats I can dress it down or put some cute strappy sandals on and dress it up. It fits perfectly and the size chart is very accurate. I got a medium and I am about 5 ft 5 and 1/2 and weigh about 118 lb. The material is nice and soft. I tried it with and without a belt and both ways are very cute. I love everything about this dress!

评论概述: Perfect dress for my graduation photoshoot
评论详情: I recently wore this red dress for my graduation photoshoot and commencement, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! The dress looks absolutely stunning in photos, and I received countless compliments throughout the day.  The length is just perfect—falling right at the knee. It's not too long to make me look old, nor too short to appear cheap. The dress strikes the ideal balance between cute and stylish. Despite being described as 1950s retro style, it has a modern flair that fits today's fashion perfectly.  The material is comfortable, and the fit is flattering. It accentuates my figure without being too tight or restrictive. The vibrant red color is eye-catching and looked amazing in my graduation photos.  Overall, this dress exceeded my expectations. If you're looking for a stylish and versatile dress for a special occasion, I highly recommend it!

I have never received so many compliments on a piece of clothing. It was comfortable and cute. I work at a school and the kids (5 to 15) were gushing over it. I went to the grocery store and received even more compliments. I do not typically wear prints but this was perfect. I wore it with black ballet flats, a black cardigan (a brighter color would've be better), and a yellow bow in my hair. It is such a fun dress!  I am a middle aged woman who is almost five feet tall and a a bit heavier than I'd like, I purchased a Medium, I'd probably fit better in the Large (I like loose fitting clothes) but Amazon recommended the Medium.
